body.p: Lemma tab provides information about different properties of the lemma. These are the following:

ul.li: Comment: Any comment to the Lemma which did not fit in any other subsection.
Comment (English translation): Any comment to the English translation of the Lemma.
Lsort, arb_vermerk, simplify, wclassnum, woart, word_class: These are information tags inherited from the previous BTS version. They are not used for newly created lemmata.
